projectGridLines.title: improve sales performance and enhance customer success
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project aims to improve sales performance and enhance

customer success initiatives within the company. It involves analyzing current

sales processes, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing strategies

to boost sales and customer satisfaction.

Skill sets:

Analytical skills for data interpretation and trend analysis

Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with sales and customer

success teams

Project management skills for coordinating and implementing new strategies

Understanding of customer behaviour and market trends

Proficiency in CRM software for tracking sales and customer interactions

Traits expectation:

Adaptability to changing market dynamics and customer needs

Dynamic and entrepreneurial thinking

Proactive problem-solving attitude

Attention to detail to ensure a seamless customer experience

Strong interpersonal skills for building relationships with clients and colleagues

Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving sales targets and customer

satisfaction metrics

Expected learning:

Understanding sales methodologies and customer success frameworks

Data analysis techniques for extracting meaningful insights

Effective communication strategies for conveying value propositions to customers

Customer relationship management best practices

Market research and competitor analysis techniques

Specific courses required for project execution:

BITS F326 Design thinking for innovation

BITS F482 Creating and leading entrepreneurial organisations

BITS F468 New venture creation

MATH F212 Optimization

ECON F212 Fundamentals of finance and accounting

GS F221 Business communication

GS F331 Tech in social research
